message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you.  Based on our discussions, I understand this product could be worth upwards of $1,500,000 to your company. I'm offering it to you at a price that's very attractive, considering its potential benefit to your business: $1,250,000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset at a price well below its estimated worth. I believe this offer is fair and beneficial for both of us. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.
